website_summaries.verdict: As long as you don't need fast autofocus or great burst shooting, the Sony Alpha ILCE-7R is great, compact alternative to entry-level full-frame cameras from Nikon and Canon.
pros: Sony Alpha ILCE-7R delivers some of the best image quality we've seen for under $3,000 in a great shooting design and feature set
cons: Disappointing autofocus speed and battery life mar an otherwise lovely camera

website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Alpha 7R is a full-frame mirrorless camera with an amazing 36-megapixel image sensor. It's not quite as fast to shoot as its twin sibling, the Alpha 7, but its image quality earns it our Editors' Choice award.
pros: Amazing high ISO performance for a high-resolution camera
Compatible with third-party lenses via adapters
cons: Focus and burst shooting are slower than Alpha 7
Some color-shift issues with third-party wide-angle rangefinder lenses
Native lens library is in its infancy

customer_reviews.title: shutter shock made it virtually unusable for even medium speeds handheld--returned it...
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent image quality when locked down on a tripod or support. I understand why landscape guys find it a nice bargain now, used, compared to the newer $3k models, but to make a hand-held stealthy, or even un-noticed image anywhere, all the people in the room would have to be previously deaf. If they weren't, they will be after it goes off... (ok, that might be a slight exaggeration..., but only slight...)
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera body
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera body, this makes me feel like I made the right decision in switching from DSLR to mirrorless. Shutter is a little louder than I hoped and it's missing in body stabilization system which is useful for videos but that could easily be made up for with a lens that has OSS. The playmemories function just makes me go crazy, I can't stop using it, I just simply can't. The battery life in this camera really sucks so make sure you get some third party extra batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great quality images. A small camera that has very sturdy build quality, accessible controls, the ability to mount legacy lenses, a full frame sensor, and high resolution. This is a great camera for doing macro work and portraits. No i have not experienced any problems with shutter shock and i have come to the conclusion that most people who have issues with it just have poor technique. The high resolution on this camera will pick up any error in technique especially with a lens that doesnt have image stabilization. This is not a camera for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: For now, it's a dream comes true.
customer_reviews.text: Mirrorless --> What you see what you get. E-mount --> interchange with aps-c format and use legacy lens. Full frame and 36 mp --> plenty details and dynamic range. Price for full frame --> affordable. Body design/form --> elegant and light. The rest of other features are convenient, not essential. I own both A7R and A7S: - A7R: perfect for shooting with details in mind. Shutter vibration exists but insignificant. Shutter sound is louder and more treble , but it's ok in exchange for a 36mp mirrorless full frame. - A7S: perfect for all lighting conditions. A dream camera for shooters. A camera that changes photographers' ways of seeing things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery from amazon and camera defective.
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera in my lawn thrown over my fence left outside in heavy rain overnight. Both amazon box and camera box was trashed as well as the manuals inside camera survived. The camera itself is slightly damaged with the Sony E-Mount damaged all my lens are loose lens move up and down. The camera I bought in used good condition so I guess I have to expect what I have is used. I just ordered a new Sony E-Mount and have to make the repairs myself. Not happy with both Amazon and the camera at the moment but I hope the part fixes the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff schultz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality! I bought this camera as a secondary ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! I bought this camera as a secondary body, but it's now my work horse. The 36MP resolution beats my Canon 5D Mark II & 6D. I pair the Sony body with a Metabones adapter and the results are spectacular. I like the Canon ergonomics much better, but I can deal with that for the major boost in resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter Imaging LLC

customer_reviews.title: The picture is so so so so so so good, far far far far better than any Canon ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is so so so so so so good, far far far far better than any Canon or Nikon machine I've seen. The battery sucks very very very very hard as well, but totally worth it, just buy a few more batteries.
customer_reviews.author: tomoyaqxn

customer_reviews.title: I bought a lemon
customer_reviews.text: This particular product worked for one month before the electronics went on the blink. Sent it away for repairs, worked for maybe six weeks more; been sitting on my shelf ever since. I was and still is very disappointed. will never buy anything from the warehouse again.
customer_reviews.author: leo l. lynch

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Used from South Korea!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this from South Korea! Was terribly worried but the camera arrived in perfect condition and works like a charm! :) From Utah.
customer_reviews.author: Talking Tree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this camera. So much lighter than my full frame dslr and just as nice
customer_reviews.author: J mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Image Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an game changer camera. The files from this camera mimics the files from my d800. Actually the files from the Sony are a little bit easier to manage in LR. I use this camera for formal portraits, excellent quality paired with FE glass..
customer_reviews.author: Rob's Photography Killeen TX

customer_reviews.title: Pure Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great for landscape, portrait. incredibly sharp and great on high ISO. works great with my old lenses (sony alphas, old nikons, old canons, voightlanders, other) I recommend de sony 55mm f1.8 FE ZA it's great and really sharp gray color this camera is not the best for sports of fast moving objects. hope they make one that does, I will buy it as a second camera for trips or work.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Spinel

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the money, way too much fun, love the weight! But get latest update. Works great on older Nikon and Cannon lenses, worth the price just for that.
customer_reviews.author: Zorro

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this camera. I use it for my portrait work and am constantly amazed at the images I get. It's gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Paige H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pictures.
customer_reviews.text: More performance and features than I know how to use. Very nice pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Ain't Nobody Got Time to Review

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5-stars
customer_reviews.text: PROS: * Incredible resolution and low light performance. * very sexy metal body CONS: * The best SONY FE lenses lack image stabilization, which makes handheld shooting difficult. * the metal ring is loose-fitting and long exposures show light leaks. (Come on, Sony) * auto-focus is much slower than NEX series cameras * does't work with IR remote, just the battery hungry mobile app (lame) Attached sample photos from are taken with tripod in low-light with intelligent auto, lens is Sony 55mm F1.8 (highest rated Sony FE)
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great for photos and video
customer_reviews.text: Excellent images quality and very good video features. Dynamic range is excellent in RAW.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon L.

customer_reviews.title: Innovative camera that produces high quality images
customer_reviews.text: My principal concern with this camera is its relatively short battery life. I would rather have a slightly larger camera if it meant a bigger battery. In fact I use the vertical grip just to get the benefit of two batteries rather than just one. It has been a relatively easy transition from the Sony SLt cameras (alpha 77 and 99) button placement is convenient. So far no inadvertent pressing of the record button that I experienced with the NEX 7. I would also like the option for a cable remote. While I can use the smart phone that depletes battery on both the phone and camera.
customer_reviews.author: eclectic reader

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Autofocus was super slow I'm not sure if it was my camera only or every camera.
customer_reviews.author: Drey

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the picture is excellent, you see and what you get
customer_reviews.text: I have been used the Nikon D800E for a while. This camera is similar as the D800E, but 7R is smaller. Quality of the picture is excellent, you see and what you get. shutter sounds a little lousy noise; Well, there is no perfect camera is in this world, you will get used to it, eventually. The 36MB image file is huge room for you to crop it. Sony high end camera equipment are expensive, but I'm happy and have a great time enjoying to take the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: moved up from Canon 5DMkIII
customer_reviews.text: Needed something small and amazing for shooting fine art. Got it with this body and the Sony/Zeiss 55mm lens. Absolutely blows the Canon and any Canon lens in my stockpile out of the water. Bear in mind that it's pretty limited in that there aren't many lenses yet for this body. Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: ACME50

customer_reviews.title: Excellent images with this advanced full frame sensor.
customer_reviews.text: The dials make aperture and shutter speed easy to change while the camera is held to the eye. It's a little pricey, for sure, and it doesn't look as impressive as a big DSLR (clients might wonder why you don't have a "good" camera), but the light weight is its greatest feature. The grip is secure. I do wish Sony offered a good 28-200 mm full frame lens for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Home Planet Images

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding package!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to use my collection of manual focus Minolta prime lenses. I have been very pleased with the results although the size of the camera places more demands on you to hold it steady. Intend to buy the Metabones Canon EOS to Sony EF mount so I can use my Canon lenses (especially my TS-E 24mm). IMO this is a very good value camera, one that I will likely go to first when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: JLouisIII

customer_reviews.title: Sony a7R - Full frame and portable!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, good construction and well made camera! The camera is light enough to bring on a high elevation trail. It is full frame 36.4 monster. If I had a few complains, the battery and memory card are made of plastic and could be stronger and the body is not really weather proof, there are no seal on the lense and the battery compartment. Otherwise a true winner for its price, class and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Buttazzoni

customer_reviews.title: replaced my 5D MK II
customer_reviews.text: I recently acquired this camera after having my 5D MK II sit in a case almost a year. I now shoot almost every day and love photography again. On top of that the quality of the photos are amazing and although it has its quirks like any camera it is my new favorite thing.
customer_reviews.author: Eli J. Mergel

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera. This is my first "serious" digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. This is my first "serious" digital camera. Now I must learn what this magical tool can do for me. Videos on a still camera with stereo sound in addition? I will try to keep up with this new tool. Wish me luck. --- Larry in Sacramento Do any of you know how I create time lapse videos with this new tool ?
customer_reviews.author: L. Hughston

customer_reviews.title: As an outdoor photographer, I couldn't be more satified with this choise.
customer_reviews.text: I started with a Sony 5N a few years ago, and it changed my life long method of picture taking forever. Soon my super heavy 5d mark II, started staying in the back pack and then not even taking it along. Sold the 5N to a dentist, and moved up to a NEX7, even more satisfaction with results. Sold the heavy Canon 5D, Kept two "L" lenses, and am now using them on my new a7r, with a Metabones adaptor. Love it. Just had another NEX5N converted to infra red, so I have been converted from a life long Canon user to all Sony. These guy's have really got it together: Larry
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not yet, better to wait.
customer_reviews.text: Full frame 36 megapixel mirrorless is a good idea, just not ready for prime time. Very loud clunky shutter, minimum shutter speed without camera shake would be 160th or 200th second. Continuous mode is out of the question. A good lens is better than more megapixels, I returned the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Maven

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Sometimes a little slow turning on
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Sometimes a little slow turning on, but otherwise fantastic. Captures great images. It is amazing what this camera can do.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great quality camera, superb image quality, especially with Canon glass...Love it coming from a 5DMIII user. Loud shutter yes, but hasn't been a problem for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Darter

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera... The shutter is super loud for a mirrorless camera BUT it's no louder than DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: marlon deleon

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: very nice performance thus far. I have gotten accustom to the louder than DSLR shutter. My greatest challenge is the the panorama function quite difficult to operate successfully
customer_reviews.author: james posey

customer_reviews.title: The best camera at this time
customer_reviews.text: For me, the best camera in the world Much better than my old Nikon D800 Light, smart, and full frame ¡
customer_reviews.author: Tachi Cano

customer_reviews.title: High grade results, but watch out for shutter vibration
customer_reviews.text: Superb resolution as good or better than Nikon D800, with superb overall image quality. But watch out for shutter vibration in the 1/15 to 1/125 range. Shoot raw ARW format for high grade results. diglloyd
customer_reviews.author: diglloyd

customer_reviews.title: thanks Sony is good my lens is not good so i am not ...
customer_reviews.text: HI I BUY OTHER LENS THEN I TAKE PICTURE THE PICTURE IS STILL BLUR THE CAMERA NOT FOCUS GOOD WHAT CAN I DO NOW THE CAMERA STILL GUARANTY CAN I RETURN THE CAMERA
customer_reviews.author: TOM LE

customer_reviews.title: ) makes images with roughly 4X the useful info in the image file than the A7R (36MP)
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why Sony can't make a decent image processor, but they can't. Whatever you do don't make side by side comparisons with a Leica M9p as I did. You'll find the Leica (18MP!) makes images with roughly 4X the useful info in the image file than the A7R (36MP). The Fujifilm XT-1 I would say makes images of roughly double the quality of the A7R. All detail with sony turns to an alien-skin-y mush. Not sure what the point of 36MP is with an image processor that can't retain any solid detail? I'll keep trying Sony, hopefully at some point they'll find someone who can write code to match the Quality that Leica digital of Fujufilm has.
customer_reviews.author: Pit

customer_reviews.title: It seemed that the camera/lens wanted to fall out of your hand much too easily. Images were much below the quality of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with the level of quality of images. I wanted to use this camera for my wife's macro pictures but using the Metabones adapter made the camera/lens combination very front heavy considering the size of the camera and lens differences (quality fx lenses). It seemed that the camera/lens wanted to fall out of your hand much too easily. Images were much below the quality of a Nikon D800e with same lens attached to each camera. Sent the camera back in a heartbeat (very next day!)
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hardman

product_meta.title: Sony a7R Full-Frame Mirrorless Digital Camera - Body Only
product_meta.description:
Style:Base| Configuration:BaseNo other full frame, interchangeable-lens camera is this light or this portable. 36MP of rich detail. A true-to-life 2.4 million dot OLED viewfinder. Wi-Fi sharing and an expandable shoe system. It's all the full-frame performance you ever wanted in a compact size that will change your perspective entirely. NFC: One-touch remote, One-touch sharing

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 






Sony® α7R Full Frame Compact Interchangeable Lens 
Digital Camera 

No other full frame, interchangeable-lens camera is this light or this portable. Features 36MP of rich detail, a true-to-life 2.4 million dot OLED viewfinder, Wi-Fi® sharing and an expandable shoe system. It's all the full-frame performance you ever wanted in a compact size that will change your perspective entirely. 


TECHNOLOGY


WORLD'S SMALLEST AND LIGHTEST1 INTERCHANGEABLE LENS FULL-FRAME CAMERA
Sony's Exmor® image sensor takes full advantage of the Full-frame format, but in a camera body less than half the size and weight of traditional full-frame DSLRs.

ULTIMATE FULL FRAME 36.3 MP RESOLUTION WITH NO OPTICAL LOW-PASS FILTER
The newly developed 36.3-megapixel 35mm full-frame Exmor® CMOS sensor delivers unbelievably high resolution in combination with high sensitivity and extremely low noise. Sony removed the optical low-pass filter to bring out the full potential of the sensor and lens, thus achieving an enhanced sense of clarity with supremely realistic details to the very edges of your photos. An AR coating also reduces flare and ghosting.

GAPLESS, OPTIMALLY POSITIONED ON-CHIP LENSES
Sony optimized the design and positioning of every on-chip lens (OCL) covering every pixel to significantly enhance light-gathering efficiency. A gapless on-chip lens design eliminates the gaps between the micro-lenses to collect more light. Moreover, each on-chip lens is optimally positioned depending on its location to accommodate the sharper angle of light entering the periphery, which is caused by larger sensor dimensions being teamed with the E-mount's short flange-back distance.




NEW BIONZ® X IMAGE PROCESSING ENGINE


Sony proudly introduces the new BIONZ® X image processing engine, which faithfully reproduces textures and details in real time, as seen by the naked eye, via extra high-speed processing capabilities. Together with front-end LSI (large scale integration) that accelerates processing in the earliest stages, it enables more natural details, more realistic images, richer tonal gradations and lower noise whether you shoot still images or movies.

FAST INTELLIGENT AF FOR RESPONSIVE, 
ACCURATE, AND GREATER OPERABILITY WITH
FULL FRAME SENSOR
The high-speed image processing engine and improved algorithms combine with optimized image sensor read-out speed to achieve ultra high-speed AF despite the use of a full-frame sensor.




FULLY COMPATIBLE WITH SONY'S E-MOUNT LENS SYSTEM AND NEW FULL-FRAME LENSES

To take advantage of the lightweight on-the-go body, the α7R full frame compact interchangeable lens digital camera is fully compatible with Sony's E-mount lens system and expanded line of E-mount compact and lightweight full-frame lenses from Carl Zeiss and Sony's premier G-series.




ADDITIONAL FEATURES

DIRECT ACCESS INTERFACE FOR FAST, INTUITIVE SHOOTING CONTROL
Quick Navi Pro displays all major shooting options on the LCD screen so you can rapidly confirm settings and make adjustments as desired without searching through dedicated menus. When fleeting shooting opportunities arise, you'll be able to respond swiftly with just the right settings.

HIGH CONTRAST 2.4M DOT OLED EVF FOR EYE-LEVEL FRAMING
View every scene in rich detail with the XGA OLED Tru-Finder, which features OLED improvements and the same 3-lens optical system used in Sony's flagship a99 DSLR. The viewfinder faithfully displays what will appear in your recording, including the effects of your camera settings, so you can accurately monitor the results. You'll enjoy rich tonal gradations and 3 times the contrast of the α99. High-end features like 100% frame coverage and a wide viewing angle are also provided.

3.0" 921K DOT LCD TILTS FOR HIGH AND LOW ANGLE FRAMING
The tiltable 3.0" (921k dots) Xtra Fine™ LCD Display makes it easy to photograph over crowds or low to capture pets eye to eye by swinging up approx. 84° and down approx. 45°. Easily scroll through menus and preview life thanks to WhiteMagic™ technology that dramatically increases visibility in bright daylight. The large display delivers brilliant-quality still images and movies while enabling easy focusing operation.

SIMPLE CONNECTIVITY TO SMARTPHONES VIA
WI-FI® OR NFC
Connectivity with smartphones for One-touch sharing/One-touch remote has been simplified with Wi-Fi®/NFC control. In addition to Wi-Fi support for connecting to smartphones, α7R also supports NFC (near field communication) providing "one touch connection" convenience when transferring images to Android™ smartphones and tablets. Users need only touch devices to connect; no complex set-up is required. Moreover, when using Smart Remote Control — a feature that allows shutter release to be controlled by a smartphone — connection to the smartphone can be established by simply touching compatible devices.

PC CONTROL W/ REMOTE VIDEO CAPTURE CONTROL
Remote Camera Control allows you to control your α7R from your PC using a USB cable. Feature control has also been updated to include video capture control.

14-BIT RAW OUTPUT FOR RICH TONAL GRADATION
14-bit RAW image data of extremely high quality is outputted by the α7R. This data fully preserves the rich detail generated by the image sensor during the 14-bit A/D conversion process. When developed with Sony's Image Data Converter RAW development software, these images deliver the superb photographic expression and rich gradation that only 14-bit data can offer.

FULL HD MOVIE2 AT 24P/60I/60P W/UNCOMPRESSED HDMI® OUTPUT
Capture Full 1920 x 1080 HD uncompressed clean-screen video files to external recording devices via an HDMI® connection in 60p and 60i frame-rates. Selectable in-camera AVCHD™ codec frames rates include super-smooth 60p, standard 60i or cinematic 24p. MP4 codec is also available for smaller files for easier upload to the web.

MULTI-INTERFACE SHOE FOR FLASH AND MICROPHONE FLEXIBILITY
Unlike conventional cameras, the α7R features the advanced Multi-Interface Shoe that dramatically expands compatibility with Sony digital imaging accessories, thus raising the potential for photo/movie shooting.

4K STILL IMAGE OUTPUT BY HDMI®8 OR WI-FI® FOR VIEWING ON 4K TVS
Enjoy Ultra High Definition slide shows directly from the camera to a compatible 4K television. The α7R converts images for optimized 4K image size playback (8MP). Enjoy expressive rich colors and amazing detail like never before. Images can be viewed via an optional HDMI connection8 or via WiFi®.

TRILUMINOUS™ COLOR OUTPUTS WIDER COLOR GAMUT TO COMPATIBLE DEVICES
TRILUMINOS™ Color technology, allows you to experience photos and movies in rich, natural colors on any TV equipped with a TRILUMINOS Display™. The expanded color gamut immerses you in those unforgettably colorful moments, from the complex shades in a shimmering blue sky to the delicate skin in a baby's face.

PLAYMEMORIES™ CAMERA APPS ALLOWS FEATURE UPGRADES
Personalize your camera by adding new features of your choice with PlayMemories™ Camera Apps. Find apps to fit your shooting style from portraits, detailed close-ups, sports, time lapse, motion shot and much more. Use apps that shoot, share and save photos using Wi-Fi® that make it easy to control and view your camera from smartphone, and post photos directly to Facebook or backup images to the cloud without connecting to a computer11.

IMAGE DATA CONVERTER
Advanced features enable manipulation, conversion and management of full-resolution RAW images. You can expertly adjust exposure, white balance, tonal curves, saturation, contrast, hue and sharpness — as well as apply DRO and vignetting compensation. Bundled Remote Camera Control software also lets you remotely activate and deactivate still/movie recording and control various camera settings from a PC.

VERTICAL GRIP CAPABLE
Enjoy long hours of comfortable operation in the vertical orientation with this sure vertical grip, which can hold two batteries for longer shooting and features dust and moisture protection.

MOUNT ADAPTORS
Both the LA-EA4 and LA-EA3 are full frame compatible adaptors that let you the α7R with any A-mount lens. Additionally, the LA-EA4 features a built-in AF motor, aperture-drive mechanism and Translucent Mirror Technology to enable continuous phase-detection AF. Both adaptors also feature a tripod hole that allows mounting of a tripod to support large A-mount lenses.

SUGGESTED ACCESSORIES

Sonnar T* FE 35MM F2.8 Zeiss e-mount lens
SEL35F28Z

Sonnar T* FE 55MM F1.8 Zeiss e-mount lens
SEL55F18Z

Vario-Tessar T* 24-70MM F4 Zeiss e-mount lens
SEL2470Z

Sony Off Camera shoe
FACS1M

Sony Genuine leather case for α7 and α7R
LCSELCA/B

Sony Semi-hard Screen Protector for α7 and α7R
PCKLM16

Sony Vertical Grip for α7 and α7R
VGC1EM

Sony A-Mount to E-mount Mount Lens Adaptor
LAEA3

Sony A-to E-mount FF Mount Adaptor w/ TMT
LAEA4

W-Series Battery Charger
BCTRW










1. Among interchangeable-lens cameras with an full frame sensor as of October 2013

2. Records in up to 29 minute segments.

8. Requires compatible BRAVIA® HDTV and cable sold separately.

11. Requires a valid Sony Entertainment Network account. Some apps require a fee.

feature_bullets: 36.4 MP full frame CMOS sensor without an anti-aliasing/OLP filter
Up to 4 FPS in Speed Priority Continuous shooting
1080/60p/24p HD video (AVCHD/MP4). Brightness Control (Viewfinder): Auto/Manual (5 steps between -2 and +2)
3" tiltable LCD with 921,600 dots. Operating temperature: 32 - 104 degrees F
1/2-inch XGA OLED color electronic viewfinder with 2.4M dots
Multi-interface shoe (optional external flash sold separately)
SD/SDHC/SDXC/Memory Stick Pro Duo card slot
Compatible lenses: Sony E-mount Full Frame, operation with Minolta/Konica Minolta Maxxum A-mount lenses confirmed via optional LA-EA3/LA-EA4 adapter
